MsgJp:
――いや、眠っていたわけではない
ただ、時折――意識が失せるのだ
MsgEn:
--No, I wasn't asleep; just occasionally—I'd lose
consciousness.

MsgJp:
――ううむ、覚者よ
そなたはまだ新たな契約を交わす段階にあらず
すでに己が器に応じた数の戦徒を統べているようだ
MsgEn:
--Ah, Arisen. You are not yet at the stage of
making a new pact. It seems you already command a
number of battle companions suited to your
abilities.

MsgJp:
――よかろう
力を授かるべき者よ、我が前に――
MsgEn:
--I am ready. You who are to be given power,
before me--

MsgJp:
――覚者よ
どうやらまだ、戦徒との新たな契約に
必要な数の<COL b92828><SPAI NAME></COL>を
持ってはおらぬようだな
MsgEn:
--Arisen, apparently you don't yet have the
required number of <COL B92828><SPAI NAME></COL>
for a new contract with the Myrmidions!

MsgJp: “悪しき竜”からの接触はないのか？

“悪しき竜”が持つ竜力の行方が
アッカーシェランの未来を決めることに
なるだろう
MsgEn:
The whereabouts of the "Evil Dragon" and its
Dragon Force will determine the future of Acre
Selund.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”が竜力を手放すとは思えん
となれば力尽くで奪うことになるのだろうか
果たして可能だろうか――
MsgEn:
I find it hard to believe that the "evil dragon"
would willingly relinquish its power. If that is
the case, would it be possible to forcefully take
it with all our strength? Is it truly feasible...?

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
MsgEn:
It seems that the "Evil Dragon" is conceited,
just like a human. That could be its weakness.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”にはおごりがあるようだ
まるで人間のようだな
それがあやつの弱点かもしれない
MsgEn:
It seems that the "Evil Dragon" is conceited,
just like a human. That could be its weakness.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の思惑がどうであれ
その竜力はネド王子が継承可能となれば
目指す道はひとつだな
MsgEn:
Regardless of the motives of the "Evil Dragon",
if Prince Nedo becomes capable of inheriting the
Dragon Force, there is only one path to pursue.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”の気配はないか――
気の乱れを見逃すなよ
MsgEn: No sign of the evil dragon...
The purpose of the "evil dragon" is unclear.
The "Evil Dragon" has not yet moved.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”をよく見ておいてくれ
同じことがこの地に起こらないとは
言えないからな
MsgEn:
Be sure to take a good look at the 'Evil Dragon,'
as we cannot say for certain that the same thing
will not happen in this land.
《Primeval Drops》 - Hm, I do not know.

MsgJp:
あと少し――生かしてくれ――
やり残した――ことが――
MsgEn:
I need you to let me live a little longer. I've
got... some unfinished business....

MsgJp: あれから３００年以上の時が過ぎている――
MsgEn: More than 300 years have passed since then.

MsgJp:
いよいよ“悪しき竜”の本拠を目指すと聞く
気の変化を見逃すなよ
MsgEn:
I hear you're finally heading to the home of the
"evil dragons." Keep an eye out for disturbances
in nature.

MsgJp:
おまえが“悪しき竜”ならどうする
野放しにしておくだろうか――
MsgEn:
What if you were an "evil dragon"? I wouldn't let
it run wild.

MsgJp:
おまえたちの勝利は“悪しき竜”の思惑に
どう影響するのか――
MsgEn:
How will your victory affect the evil dragon's
agenda...

MsgJp:
このレスタニアを竜なき世界にすることだけは
避けねばならぬ――
MsgEn:
We must not let Lestania become a land without
dragons. We must avoid—

MsgJp:
さあ、行くがよい
ここは――わたしはもう大丈夫だ
MsgEn: Go on, go on, go. Here, I'm all right now.

MsgJp:
しかし、覚者よ――学ぶがよい
人の思いは、時に、竜をも狂わせるのだ
MsgEn:
However, Arisen, it is good to learn. The
thoughts of man can sometimes drive even dragons
mad.

MsgJp:
しばし眠るが――
まどろみの中でも、気の変化はわかる
――案ずることはない
MsgEn:
I sleep for a while, but—even in slumber, I know
when your spirit has changed. Don't worry...

MsgJp:
そうか――黒い鎧の騎士は
姿を見せぬか
MsgEn:
Well—the knight in black armor is nowhere to be
seen.

MsgJp:
その掌握は我が手に余る
目を離すなよ
MsgEn: It's out of my control. Keep an eye on it.

MsgJp: そろそろ姿を現すかもしれないぞ

ふむ――
我が力、自覚以上に失われているようだ
MsgEn:
Hmm. I seem to have lost more of my power than I
realized.

MsgJp:
ふむ――匂いが変わったな
彼の地の竜力は焼けた匂いがする
MsgEn:
Hmm... The smell has changed. The dragon force of
this land smells burnt.

MsgJp: ふむ――異郷の匂いがするぞ
MsgEn: Hm... I sense the scent of a foreign land.

MsgJp:
よもやとは思うが――
ネド王子の言動に気をつけるがよい
MsgEn:
While it may seem unlikely, it is advisable to be
wary of Prince Nedo's demeanor and actions.

MsgJp: わたしには休息が必要だ

アッカーシェランの幼き覚者を守り
覚者の道を教えられるのは
おまえたちの他にはいない
MsgEn:
To protect the young Arisen of Acre Selund, and
teach them the path of the Arisen, there is no one
else but you.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランの習わしでは
王子が竜を継ぐはずだ
MsgEn:
According to Acre Selund custom, the prince is
supposed to inherit the dragon.

MsgJp:
セシリーは覚者ではあるが
未だ途上の覚者――
我が覚者よ――その原因を探すのだ
MsgEn:
Cecily is an Arisen, but still an aspiring
one—Oh, my Arisen—search for the cause of it.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの竜への敬意――
けして忘れてはならぬ
MsgEn:
In reverence to the dragons of Phindym, never to
be forgotten.

MsgJp:
フィンダムの竜を見よ
意識が途切れ――乱れているようだ
MsgEn:
Behold the dragon of Phindym: His consciousness
is faltering - it appears to be in turmoil.

MsgJp: 人は竜と大地の下僕のように思えるかもしれない
MsgEn:
One may appear to be a servant of the dragon and
the earth.

MsgJp: 全てを見通すことはまだ――できぬか――
MsgEn:
I don't know if you've seen it all yet... or if
you haven't.

MsgJp:
去った者のことは忘れることだ
頼りたいと思った時――
おまえの負けが決まるだろう
MsgEn:
Forget about those who have departed. The moment
you think of depending on them... is the moment
you seal your defeat.

MsgJp:
大きな戦いの時は“悪しき竜”の動向に
気を配るのだ
MsgEn:
In the great battle, you must watch out for the
"evil dragon."

MsgJp:
大切な話がある
心身ともに健やかな時に――頼む
MsgEn:
I have something important to tell you. When
you're healthy, both mentally and
physically—please.

MsgJp:
契約に必要な数、<COL b92828><SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を手に入れてのち
再び我にその証を示すがよい――
MsgEn:
After you have the <COL B92828><SPAI NUM>
pieces</COL> required for the covenant, show me
the proof again...

MsgJp:
常ならぬ気配は弱まるどころかさらに強くなる
あの娘が強い気を発してるが
それだけではない――
MsgEn:
The unusual presence doesn't weaken, it grows
stronger. The girl emits a strong spirit, but
that's not the only thing—

MsgJp: 幸い竜力はすべて戻ったようだ
MsgEn:
Fortunately, all dragon force seems to have
returned.

MsgJp:
広く伝えよ――
覚者にならんと思う者――我は拒まぬ
MsgEn:
Spread the word—Whoever wants to become an
Arisen—I will not reject them.

MsgJp:
後悔の渦に足を取られるな
前を見た者だけが川を渡ることができるのだ
MsgEn:
Do not let yourself be dragged down by the
whirlpool of regret. Only those who look ahead can
cross the river.

MsgJp:
悪意は消えぬ――
そこかしこの闇に潜む黒き悪意――
MsgEn:
The malice will not disappear—The black malice
that lurks in every corner of the darkness.

MsgJp: 惑いし者よ、畏れずに眼（まなこ）を開け
MsgEn: O bewildered one, open your eyes without fear.

MsgJp:
我が加護を、おまえたちの言葉に乗せて
民たちに運ぶのだ
MsgEn:
My blessings in your words. Carry my favor to
your people.

MsgJp: 我が奪われし竜力はまだか――
MsgEn: My stolen dragon force is not yet—

MsgJp:
我が肉体が潤えばじきに大地も
元に戻るだろう
MsgEn:
If my body is nourished, soon the earth will also
return to its original state.

MsgJp:
我にとっても短くはない時間だ
いわんや、人間にとっては――
MsgEn:
It's not a short time for me either. For a man,
no less...

MsgJp:
敵の狙いが見えぬ――
理に傷を付け何を求めるのか――
MsgEn:
The enemy's aim is unclear. What do they seek by
undermining order?—

MsgJp:
敵意――悪意――我ら竜が最も鋭敏に
感じる意識だ
MsgEn:
Arisen...Hostility - Malice - It is the sensation
that we, the dragons, most keenly sense.

MsgJp: 沈黙こそ我が意力の糧――
MsgEn: Silence is the food of my willpower.

MsgJp:
波を感じる――
はるか遠く、地平の彼方――
MsgEn: Feel the waves—far, far beyond the horizon—

MsgJp:
漂う穢れた気は――
魔物どもが発するもののようだ
MsgEn:
The impure aura emanating from them seems similar
to what monsters emit.

MsgJp:
王子の持つ笛とはいかなる理が
はたらくものなのだろうか――
MsgEn:
What logic is there in knowing that the prince
has a flute... I wonder if it works.

MsgJp:
王子の行動は自信と確信に満ちている
そうは思わないか？
MsgEn:
The prince's actions are filled with confidence
and conviction. Don't you think so?

MsgJp:
王子は、黒い竜に倒されたとする火竜と
如何ほどの時を過ごしたのだろうか――
MsgEn:
How much time did the prince spend with the fire
dragon, who was supposedly slain by the black
dragon?

MsgJp:
理の揺らぎを感じる――
何が起こるというのか――
MsgEn:
I feel a shifting of order—What is going to
happen—?

MsgJp:
異国の娘から目を離すな――
罪はなくとも、災いを呼び寄せるのはあの娘だ
MsgEn:
Do not take your eyes off the foreign girl—Even
though she is innocent, it is that girl who brings
disaster upon us.

MsgJp:
異変の原因は大地の病か――
ふむ――
覚者たちよ――これは根深いぞ――
MsgEn:
Is the cause of the anomaly the illness of the
land—? Hmm—Oh, Arisen—this is deeply rooted—

MsgJp:
目下の敵の向こうに真の敵がいるはずだ
その姿を見逃すでないぞ
MsgEn:
Beyond the enemy at hand, there must be a true
enemy. Don't lose sight of that.

MsgJp: 真に強き魂あらば、闇は消え去る――
MsgEn:
When the soul is truly strong, the darkness will
disappear.

MsgJp:
竜と大地と民――
崩れた均衡を調和の中に戻すのは
難しい――心して、事に当たれ
MsgEn:
Dragons, the earth, and the people—To restore the
collapsed balance harmoniously is
difficult—approach with care and sincerity.

MsgJp:
竜に意識を向けろ
一時たりとも忘れるな
MsgEn:
Direct your attention towards the dragon. Never
forget, even for a moment.

MsgJp:
竜を救え――
竜だけが我々に真実を語ることができるだろう
MsgEn:
Save the dragon—Only the dragon will be able to
tell us the truth.
We must take back the dragon's force.

MsgJp:
笛があれば竜に勝てると
王子は信じているようだが――
MsgEn:
The prince seems to believe that with a flute, he
can beat the dragon—

MsgJp:
精霊竜は己を知っている
それ故、セシリーをここへ送り込んだのだ
――判断の正しさを見せてやれ
MsgEn:
The spirit dragon knows itself. That's why they
sent Cecily here. Show them the truth of their
decision.

MsgJp: 義なき怒りは、身を滅ぼす――
覚者の使命、ゆめゆめ忘れるな
MsgEn: The mission of the Arisen, don't ever forget it.

MsgJp:
覚者よ
我が目となり、耳となり――頼むぞ
MsgEn: O Arisen One, Be my eyes and ears - I beseech you.

MsgJp:
覚者よ
若い人間の不安定な心――
MsgEn: Arisen. The unstable mind of a young human—

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
レスタニアを巡り、民の力となれ
我が加護を、あまねく伝えるのだ
MsgEn:
Arisen. I call upon you to travel throughout the
land of Lestania and help your people. Spread my
blessing far and wide.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
事を急げ――
邪気は日ごと強くなる――
MsgEn:
Arisen ones—Hasten your actions—The malevolent
energy grows stronger every day—

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
我が力、レスタニアの外へは届かぬ
大地と人を味方にして力とするがいい
MsgEn:
Arisen—My power cannot reach beyond the borders
of Lestania. Let earth and man be your allies and
your strength!

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
新たなるポーンとの《戦徒の契り》を望むか
ならばその資格たる証――
<COL b92828><SPAI NAME> <SPAI NUM> 個</COL>を我に示せ
MsgEn:
Arisen— Do you desire a new "Myrmidon's Pledge"
with a pawn? If so, prove to me your qualification
by presenting <COL B92828><SPAI NUM> pieces of
<SPAI NAME></COL>.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
自らの出自を忘れるな
MsgEn: O Arisen one—Remember where you come from.

MsgJp:
覚者よ――
自らの闇を凝視せよ――
MsgEn: Arisen, Gaze upon your own darkness—

MsgJp: 覚者よ――人の時代を記憶し――愛でるがいい
MsgEn:
Arisen, remember the era of humans and cherish it
with love.
Arisen, what matter brings you to me?

MsgJp: 覚者よ、風となり大地を駆けよ――我が魂を運べ
MsgEn:
Arisen, become the wind and race across the earth
- carry my soul.

MsgJp: 語るべき言葉――今はない
MsgEn: The words to speak—Now there are none.

MsgJp:
過去に類無き空の火球――
理の盤石が揺らいでいるというのか――
MsgEn:
A fireball in the sky like never before... The
very foundation of order is being shaken...

MsgJp:
道理を外れた世界も、これで理の中に
戻るだろう
MsgEn:
Worlds that stray from order, will return to
order with this.

MsgJp:
邪悪な気の流れ――
おまえたちも感ずることが
できればいいのだが――
MsgEn:
The flow of evil energy—If you could feel it...
If only you could sense it, too.

MsgJp:
邪気が少しばかり薄らいだようだ
おかしい――
いや、息を潜めているつもりだろうか――
MsgEn:
It seems that the evil aura has slightly
subsided. Strange... No, perhaps it's just hiding
its presence...

MsgJp:
鍛錬せよ
おまえたちは抜き身の刃――研がねば、朽ちる
MsgEn:
Train yourself. You are the unsheathed
blade—Sharpen or decay.

MsgJp:
黒い鎧の騎士――
正体の見極めを急いでくれ
MsgEn:
The knight in black armor—I need you to hurry up
and find out who he is.

MsgJp: 黒き鎧の災いは――厄介だぞ
MsgEn:
The curse of the black armor is troublesome,
indeed.

MsgJp: （目を閉じ、何かを考えているようだ）
MsgEn:
(With their eyes closed, they seem to be deep in
thought).

MsgJp: ――感謝しなくてはなりませんね
MsgEn: I have to say—thank you for that.

MsgJp: 《ブラッドオーブ》がもっと手に入れば――
MsgEn: If only I could get more Blood Orbs.

MsgJp:
あなたは覚者です
苦難の道は――避けられません
MsgEn:
You are an Arisen. The path of hardship cannot be
avoided.

MsgJp:
いがみ合いが元気の源だという人もいるようですが
わたしにはまったく理解できません――
MsgEn:
Some people seem to think that bickering is the
source of energy. I don't understand it at
all—I've never understood it.

MsgJp:
いまは少し――心持ちが乱れています
お待ちを――
MsgEn:
I'm a little... distracted at the moment. Please
be patient.

MsgJp:
おかえりなさい
時に、皆さんとのご挨拶がまだでは？
MsgEn:
Welcome back. By the way, have I greeted everyone
yet?

MsgJp:
お手伝いできてうれしく思っています
これで押しも押されもせぬ立派な覚者ですね
MsgEn: I'm happy to help. Now you're a well-known Arisen!

MsgJp:
でも、白竜様に捧げられた命は
けして無駄にはなりません
MsgEn:
But the lives dedicated to the White Dragon will
not be in vain.

MsgJp:
もう、昔のようには戻れないのですか？
あなたはどんな印象を受けましたか？
MsgEn:
Can we go back to the way things used to be? What
impression did you get?

MsgJp:
わたしは契約のお手伝いをすることに
なっていますので、その時を楽しみにして
待っていますね
MsgEn:
I'm supposed to help with the contract, so I'm
looking forward to that time.

MsgJp:
アルヴァーには会えましたか？
早く契約までいけると良いですね
MsgEn:
Did you get to meet Alvar? I hope you can get to
the contract soon.

MsgJp: イリスのことを聞きましたが――

イリスの様子はやはり変ですね
わたしが話したがっていると伝えてくれますか？
MsgEn:
Iris is still acting weird. Can you tell her I
want to talk to her?

MsgJp:
エルフの仲間が面倒を見るということであれば
その方がメイリーフにとっては良いことなのかも
しれませんね――
MsgEn:
If it means that the elf's friends will be taken
care of, it might be better for Mayleaf. Maybe—

MsgJp:
オークの時のようにうまく想像できませんが
でも、白竜様が強い憎しみの気を放っている――
それだけはわかるのです
MsgEn:
I can't envision it as well as I did with the
orcs. But The White Dragon is radiating a strong
aura of hatred—that much I know!

MsgJp:
オークの臭いがするなどと騒いだりして
ごめんなさい
あの臭いが恐ろしくてならないのです
MsgEn:
I'm sorry I made such a fuss about the smell of
orcs. I'm sorry... I'm afraid of that smell.

MsgJp:
メイリーフの素性を知ったのですか？
あの一族は、今や、このレスタニアの宝石です
MsgEn:
Have you learned of Mayleaf's true identity? That
family is now the jewel of this Lestania.

MsgJp:
レオが白竜様を見つめていました
思い詰めているようでしたが――
MsgEn:
Leo was staring at The White Dragon. He seemed to
be pondering—

MsgJp:
下の街の皆さんが安心して暮らせるように
どうかよろしくお願いしますね
MsgEn:
I hope everyone in the city below can live in
peace. Please do help us to do so.

MsgJp:
争いのない世を望みながらも、我らの手は
戦の血で汚れていく――虚しきことです
MsgEn:
We hope for a world without strife, but our hands
are stained with the blood of war - a vain thing!

MsgJp:
人は弱きもの――それゆえ
その力を紡ぎ、束ねんとするのです
MsgEn:
Humans are weak—that is why we weave together and
gather our strength.

MsgJp: 今後もこのようなことが起こるのでしょうか――
MsgEn: Will this continue to happen in the future—?

MsgJp:
信じましょう
白竜様の大いなる加護を
MsgEn:
Let us believe in the great blessings of the
White Dragon.

MsgJp:
大変な戦いだったと聞いています
断ち切られた人生も多かったと――
MsgEn:
I hear it was a tough fight, and a lot of lives
were cut short—

MsgJp:
少し、甘えてしまったかもしれません
これからは気をつけますね
MsgEn:
I may have spoiled it a little. I'll be careful
from now on.

MsgJp:
強く、澄み切った命でした
彼の命のあり方は素晴らしい
MsgEn:
It was a strong, clear life. The way he lived his
life was amazing.

MsgJp:
心の水面が平らかならば
本来、誰にでも竜の心は伝わるのです
MsgEn:
If the surface of the heart is calm, then the
true essence of the dragon's heart can be
understood by anyone.

MsgJp:
持ち去ったエルフの命――
敵はいったいどうするつもりでしょう
MsgEn:
The life of an elf taken away... What will the
enemy do?

MsgJp: 無理をきいてくれてありがとうございました
MsgEn: Thank you for taking on the impossible.

MsgJp:
白竜様がこっそりご加護をくださったのかも
しれませんね
MsgEn:
Maybe the White Dragon has secretly given us a
blessing.

MsgJp: 白竜様が回復される日までともに頑張りましょう
MsgEn:
Until the day The White Dragon is restored, let's
do our best together.

MsgJp:
白竜様が空を飛ぶお姿――
いつか見たいものですね
MsgEn:
I hope to see the White Dragon flying in the
sky—one day!

MsgJp:
白竜様の回復にはまだ時間がかかるようです
これからもわたしたちでお守りしなくては――
MsgEn:
It will take some time for The White Dragon to
recover. We must continue to protect him—

MsgJp:
白竜様の回復は一進一退――
特に石化の症状は油断がなりません
MsgEn:
The White Dragon's recovery has been a step in
the right direction—The petrification symptoms can
be especially tricky!

MsgJp: 白竜様の言葉こそ、導（しるべ）の光――
MsgEn:
The words of the White Dragon are indeed the
guiding light.

MsgJp:
自由に振る舞う覚者が増えていますが
白竜様あっての覚者であることだけは
心に留めておいてください
MsgEn:
There are more Arisen behaving freely, but please
always keep in mind that it is thanks to The White
Dragon that they exist.

MsgJp:
覚者になってまだ日が浅いのに
《ブラッドオーブ》を持ち帰るなんて――
MsgEn:
Even though it has only been a short time since
becoming an Arisen, I can't believe you brought
back a "Blood Orb."

MsgJp:
語るべき何か――伝えるべき何か――
大切な言葉はいつも白竜様が教えてくれます
そう――わたし自身の言葉ではないのです
MsgEn:
Something to tell—something to convey... The
important words are always taught by The White
Dragon. Yes—it is not my own words.

MsgJp:
迷った時は、耳をすませてください
白竜様の教えがあなたを導くでしょう
MsgEn:
When in doubt, listen, and let the teachings of
The White Dragon guide you!

MsgJp:
顔色が、すぐれぬようですね
どうかご自愛を
MsgEn: You don't look well. Please take care of yourself.

MsgJp:
騎士団と覚者の揉め事に
巻き込まれてしまったと聞きました
大丈夫でしたか？
MsgEn:
I heard that you got involved in a dispute
between the Knights order and the Arisen. Are you
okay?

MsgJp:
魔物たちの標的になっても不思議では
ありません
どうか、気にしてあげてくださいね
MsgEn:
No wonder they were the target of demons. Please,
please, please take care of them!

MsgJp:
――と前向きに考えることにするよ
これも処世術と言えないこともないね
MsgEn:
--I'm going to try to think positively and this
is another way to get by, I guess.

MsgJp:
――！？　ああ、ごめんごめん
ちょっと考え事をね
MsgEn:
—!? Ah, sorry, sorry. I was just thinking about
something.

MsgJp:
“悪しき竜”は力だけを与えられた子供――
そんなふうに考えられないかな？
MsgEn:
Can't we consider the "Evil Dragon" as a child
who has been bestowed with power alone?

MsgJp:
《ブラッドオーブ》のことは
常に気にしておくといいよ
見つけると確実に一目置かれるからね
MsgEn:
It's good to always keep in mind about the 《Blood
Orb》, because when you find it, you're sure to be
admired.

MsgJp:
ああ、ごめん
今は特に話すことはないよ
MsgEn:
Oh, sorry. I don't really have anything to tell
you right now.

MsgJp:
あのゲートはフィンダムの竜の力が
生み出したものだ
僕らの心意気だけじゃどうにもならないよ
MsgEn:
That gate is the result of the power of Phindym's
dragon. It can't be done with just our
determination alone.

MsgJp:
あははは――
こんなに神殿の近くが戦場になるなんて――
ああ、怖かった
MsgEn:
Ahahaha— Who would have thought that the area
near the temple would turn into a battlefield— Oh,
how scary.

MsgJp:
あやふやとはいえ、ロイグの方が色々と
覚えているからね
その情報だけでも、ありがたいと思わなくちゃ
MsgEn:
Even if uncertain, Loeg remembers various things,
so I must be grateful for that information alone.

MsgJp:
あれこれ書物に当たっているけど
こんな危機はかつてなくて
白竜様と僕たちが初めてのようだ
MsgEn:
I'm hitting various books and such, but this
crisis is unprecedented. It feels like The White
Dragon and we are experiencing something for the
first time.

MsgJp:
いささか――怖いね
でも、ほら、白竜様がお待ちだよ
MsgEn:
It's a little scary— but look, The White Dragon
is waiting for you.

MsgJp:
いつ襲撃されてもおかしくないから
四方八方、気を抜かないようにね
MsgEn:
Since we could be attacked at any time, let's
stay on high alert in all directions.

MsgJp:
いや、君にも心配かけたよね
迎えに来てくれてありがとう
本当に感謝しているよ
MsgEn:
No, I caused you to worry too, didn't I? Thank
you for coming to pick me up. I really appreciate
it.

MsgJp:
おかしいよ――
第一のアークの調査は僕が担当したんだ
MsgEn:
That's strange—I was in charge of investigating
the first Ark.

MsgJp:
おや、疲れたのかい？
覚者も無敵ってわけじゃないんだな
MsgEn:
Oh, you're tired, aren't you? I guess even the
Arisen aren't invincible.

MsgJp:
くれぐれも気をつけてくれよ
無事にここへ戻って来ると約束してほしい
君たちは歴史の証言者なんだからね
MsgEn:
Please be careful and make sure to return here
safely. I want you to promise me that. You are
witnesses to history, after all.

MsgJp:
ここでジッとしてはいられない
僕もメルゴダへ行く！　絶対行く！
MsgEn:
I can't stay still here. I'm going to Mergoda!
I'm definitely going!

MsgJp:
この世界は好きかい？
僕は好きだよ
知れば知るほど――もっと知りたくなる
MsgEn:
Do you like this world? I do. The more you
know—the more you want to know.

MsgJp:
これからフィンダムへの渡航者が増えるだろうね
もちろん僕も準備を進めているんだ
MsgEn:
The number of travelers to Phindym is likely to
increase from now on, and of course, I am also
preparing for it.

MsgJp: これは悪くない事だと思うよ
MsgEn: I think this is not a bad thing.

MsgJp:
これは王子なりによく考えた末の
行動だと思うよ
そうじゃないと、君たちから聞いていた
王子の印象と合わないからね
MsgEn:
I think this is an action that the prince has
carefully considered. Otherwise, it wouldn't match
the impression of the prince that I have heard
from you.

MsgJp:
ごめん！
アークの調査報告が最優先でね
あちこち気が回らないんだよ
MsgEn:
Sorry! The Ark's investigation report is the top
priority. I can't focus on other things.

MsgJp:
さあ、みんなが待ってるよ？
君がなんとかしてくれる――
そう思っている連中も多いはずさ
MsgEn:
Come on, the guys are waiting for you, okay?
You'll handle it—I'm sure a lot of them think so.

MsgJp:
さびしいね――
仲良くなれそうな気がしたんだけど――
いや、仲良かったよね――
MsgEn:
It's lonely, isn't it... I felt like we could
become close... No, we were close, right...

MsgJp:
すまないけど、少し考えたいことがあるんだ
後で話そうよ
MsgEn:
Sorry, I just have a few things to think about.
We can talk later.

MsgJp:
ずっと考えているんだけど――
ディアマンテスは僕が跡を継ぎたがるって
本気で考えたのかな――
MsgEn:
I keep thinking—that Diamantes wants me to follow
in his footsteps. Did he really think—?

MsgJp:
そして、白竜様の回復を促す新しい方法も
見つかったみたいだ
これからも、もっと色々なことが
起こりそうな気がするよ
MsgEn:
And it seems that a new method to encourage the
recovery of The White Dragon has been found. I
feel like more things are going to happen from now
on.

MsgJp:
そして、良さそうなのがあれば
君たちにも伝えるからね
MsgEn:
And if there is something good, I will also let
you guys know.

MsgJp:
その心の暗い部分に黒騎士が
入り込んだ――か
MsgEn:
Did the Black Knight enter the dark depths of
your heart?

MsgJp:
その目的を果たしたあとは
どんな顔をして仲間のところへ戻る気で
いるんだろうね
あまり考えていないのかな
MsgEn:
After achieving that goal, I wonder what
expression they will have when they return to
their comrades. I wonder if they haven't thought
about it much.

MsgJp:
それなのに僕は――
悔やんでも悔やみきれないよ
MsgEn: And yet, I can't help but regret and regret.

MsgJp:
それにしてもあのロイグがね――
心根のいい奴に思えたけどなあ
僕の人を見る目もまだまだだね
MsgEn:
That Loeg, though... He seemed like a
good-hearted guy. I still have a long way to go in
judging people.

MsgJp:
そんなことしている場合じゃないと思うけど
時間をもらえるのはありがたいことだから
僕は僕で独自に調べようと思っている
MsgEn:
I don't think this is the time for that, but it's
nice to have some time. I am thinking of
researching on my own.

MsgJp:
だから僕は、こっち側の人たちと神殿の
架け橋になろうと思うんだ
MsgEn:
That's why I want to become a bridge between the
people on this side and the temple.

MsgJp:
だとしたら、哀れだね
出会ったばかりの僕しか後継者候補は
いないのか――ってさ
MsgEn:
If that's the case, it's pitiful, isn't it? Are
there really no other candidates for the successor
besides me, someone you just met?

MsgJp:
ちょうど君が覚者になった頃からこれまでとは
少し違う事件が起こるようになってきた
オークの活動が活発になったり――
ほら、アークの出現もそうだね
MsgEn:
Since you became an Arisen, there have been
different incidents occurring from before until
now. The Orcs have become more active, and, well,
the appearance of the Ark, too.

MsgJp:
でも、君が持ち帰った古文書は面白そうで――
まずいな――ジョゼフ様に叱られるよ
MsgEn:
But, the old document you took home seems
interesting... Uh-oh... I'm going to get scolded
by Joseph, aren't I?

MsgJp:
となると、レスタニアの混乱がこの程度で
済んでいるのは、とてつもなく運が
いいのかもしれないね
MsgEn:
If that's the case, it might be incredibly lucky
that the chaos in Lestania has been settled to
this extent.

MsgJp: とにもかくにも今はネド王子だね
MsgEn: In any case, you are Prince Nedo now.

MsgJp:
どうだい？
覚者の生活には慣れたかな？
MsgEn:
How about it? Are you used to the life of an
Arisen?

MsgJp:
ひとつだけわかったのは――
“悪しき竜”はすぐに君たちを亡き者に
するつもりはないということ
MsgEn:
The only thing I understood is that the "Evil
Dragon" has no intention of taking you out
immediately.

MsgJp: まあ、今は生きのびてくれることを祈ろう
MsgEn: Well, let's pray that they'll survive.

MsgJp: また何か起こりそうな気配だね
MsgEn: It feels like something is about to happen again.

MsgJp:
まだ正体はわからないんだけど
どこかに落ちたらしいんだ
うわさか何か聞いてないかい？
MsgEn:
I still do not know what it truly is, but it
seems to have fallen somewhere. Have you heard any
rumors or something?

MsgJp:
まだ読み切れていない古文書もあるし
ここまで実際に体験したことを
評価し直す必要があるかもしれない
MsgEn:
There are some ancient documents that have not
yet been fully read, and I may need to reevaluate
what I've actually done so far.

MsgJp:
まだ読んでいない書物、まだ試していない実験――
心残りがあるうちは、死ねないよ
MsgEn:
Books you haven't read yet, experiments you
haven't tried yet—You can't die while you have
regrets.

MsgJp:
もう友達をなくすのは絶対に嫌だから
思ったことは口にするつもりだよ
MsgEn:
I absolutely don't want to lose any more friends,
so I intend to speak my mind.

MsgJp:
もしかしたら、僕が覚者の力に
なれるのかもしれないな――
MsgEn:
Perhaps, I may be able to become a powerful
Arisen...

MsgJp:
やあ、新人さん
最初は誰彼かまわず顔を売っておくといいよ
MsgEn:
Hello, new person. It's good to make yourself
known to everyone at first, regardless of who they
are.

MsgJp:
やっぱり僕は生きているキースヒルトと
もっと話したかったよ――
MsgEn:
I knew I wanted to talk more with Kieshildt. I
just wish I could have told you more—

MsgJp:
よく考えると、このレスタニアでも
竜の不調は続いているわけだよね
MsgEn:
When I think about it, even in this Lestania, the
dragon's condition continues to worsen, doesn't
it?

MsgJp: ん？　どうしたんだい？

アッカーシェランか
自然環境はこっちとほぼ同じなんだね
つまり、理と竜の世界ということか
MsgEn:
Is this Acre Selund? The natural environment here
is almost the same, right? In other words, it's a
world of order and dragons.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランで“悪しき竜”との
全面戦争が始まるのかな
MsgEn:
Is a full-scale war against the "Evil Dragon"
about to begin in Acre Selund?

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランとも、フィンダムのような
友好的な関係になれるといいね
MsgEn:
I hope we can establish a friendly relationship
with Acre Selund, just like with Phindym.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランに灯った希望の火を
消してはいけないよ
MsgEn:
Do not extinguish the flame of hope that has been
lit in Acre Selund!

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランの状況は良くないみたいだけど
それでも君たちはレスタニアの代表なんだ
MsgEn:
The situation in Acre Selund doesn't seem to be
good, but even so, you are representatives of
Lestania.

MsgJp:
アーク調査の報告書がまだだというのに
古文書の解読まで――
MsgEn:
Despite the fact that the report on the Ark
investigation is not yet complete, up until the
deciphering of the ancient documents—

MsgJp:
イリスとは話したかい？
なんだか避けられているような気が
しないでもないんだけど――
MsgEn:
Did you talk to Iris? I can't help but feel like
she's avoiding me.

MsgJp: ガルドリンには特に強く言っておかないと
MsgEn: I need to make sure to tell Gurdolin firmly.

MsgJp:
ゲートの継続性について
もう少し確信が得られないと
僕は向こうへは行けないな
MsgEn:
Regarding the sustainability of the gate, I
cannot go over there without a little more
certainty.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様がまたなんか言ってるだろ？
人を疑うのが性分なんだね
MsgEn:
Joseph is saying something again, right? It's in
his nature to suspect others.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様の助手になって以来初めての
大仕事を仰せつかって、その計画をね――
ふふふ――
MsgEn:
Since becoming Joseph's assistant, this is the
first big job I've been entrusted with, and I am
now tasked with the planning... hehehe...

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様の話を聞いていると
まるで僕たちがフィンダムへの侵略者のように
思えてくるよ
MsgEn:
When listening to Joseph's story, it feels as if
we are invaders to Phindym.

MsgJp:
セシリーは深手を負っている
致命傷がなければ命は助かるだろうけど
回復には長い時間がかかるよ
MsgEn:
Cecily has suffered a serious injury. If there is
no fatal wound, she should survive, but recovery
will take a long time.

MsgJp:
ディアマンテス――
イリスは確かにそう言ってたよね？
MsgEn: Diamantes - Iris did say that, right?

MsgJp:
ディアマンテスに対抗する錬金術師が
ちゃんといたことがうれしくてね
MsgEn:
I am happy that there was an alchemist who could
oppose Diamantes.
